data.title: Love Island 2024 soundtrack: All the songs from season 11
data.meta_description: All the songs from season 11 of Love Island 2024.
data.text:
Casa Amor has returned for another exciting instalment on Love Island 2024, with the Islanders' heads scrambled as the bombshells make their intentions clear.

Advertisement

Over the week, the girls and boys have been split into two separate villas, as they test their connections and decide whether or not they'd like to crack on with the Casa bombshells.

So far there have been racy challenges, plenty of shouting as the girls try to get the boys attention from the Casa Amor villa and even more kissing.

As usual, Love Island paired all of these dramatic moments with some music to really amp up the atmosphere.

If you found yourself humming along to some of the tunes during the last few episodes, here is a breakdown of all the songs that were featured.

More like this
